title: How Salem rallied after the government shutdown closed bathrooms during its busy Halloween season

title: Mass. man facing 29 charges after alleged 5-month crime spree

title: DA’s office asking residents to submit DNA samples to help solve 1993 murder
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime The voluntary collection is in hopes of finding new investigative leads.
Holly Piirainen.

title: No one paid them to say this. These Boston influencers just really love their city.
author: Zipporah Osei
bullets: Community We asked Boston's top content creators what they love most about their city — that they aren't paid to promote.

In its November issue, Boston magazine released its list of the top influencers and content creators representing Boston, including gluten-free foodies, comedians, fashion vloggers, and everything in between.
(Photographer: Frankie Alduino, Stylist: Sheila Jarnes) Frankie Alduino ShareSend this article to your social connections.
